name: LD49 Unstable
description:
Back Alley E.R.

A back alley E.R. has pulled you off the street to help deal with all the people suddenly being sent to their illustrious establishment. Learn how to care for them patients on the job so Kyle from HR doesn't yell at you.

Read the patient information, connect the vitals monitors to the patient, administer medication to try and stabilize the patients before sending them to other parts of the hospital for observation and further care

Different tools and treatments use different areas of the body.

Refresh a syringe after use by putting it back on the tray.

Completely mouse controlled except for the ESC to exit at any time.

No volume controls, but hopefully it's not too loud.

Known bug: Sometimes the toe tags become unusable. Just send the patient away and they will reset.

>Code by Xeke

>Graphics by Blurde

>Audio by Kyle
